articles.author: Laurence Dollimore
articles.title: Ex-Radio 2 star Simon Mayo says working for the BBC was 'soul destroying' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Simon Mayo, 63, hosted an acclaimed film review show for more than two decades with Mark Kermode, 58, on various BBC channels, before recently moving it to Sony.
articles.content: A former BBC star has branded the broadcaster 'soul destroying' for the 'hoops' it makes people jump through to get a show greenlit - adding that his podcast fronted by two men would have 'no chance'… [+5114 chars]
